Я играл в неё когда был в 1 классе, и когда я первый раз её проходил, было чувство такое как будто уют. Игра просто вах! Единственная в своём роде. Я её прошёл 6 раз и буду перепроходить! Да у меня 14 часов наиграно и тип 6 раз прошёл? Ало? Я играл в неё на пиратке и у меня был старый аккаунт который украли. Для 2011 это прорыв в сфере игр! Кто не прошёл её обязательно пройдите!
its fun u can do a lot and even try out other maps with the right friend its ton of fun!!

Portal2 überzeugt mit jeder Menge Spielwitz, tollen Rätseln und macht unglaublich Laune. Ich habe selten über Kommentare von Robotern so herzhaft gelacht ;) Für alle, die Spaß an kniffeligen Aufgaben haben, ist mindestens das Anspielen meiner Meinung nach ein Muss!
The game is very nostalgic, great. I reccomend.

Another great game by Valve

I can't believe I haven't reviewed this yet. I appreciated portal 2 for the campaign and multiplayer courses. But the thing that really blew me away was the custom test chambers. For those unaware there are courses made by the community that are absolutely worth it on their own.  I highly recommend checking these out, because certain rooms break the ideas of what should be possible, and they're completely free to download on the workshop. Back to the campaigns: the secrets and ways you can solve each puzzle are varied and give the player just enough difficulty to not get them to quit. Overall I adore this game, and would highly recommend it.

5 STARS.

What more can be said about this game that hasn't been said? THE BEST puzzle game you can play. Great humor, level design, story, execution. It's not usual that a sequel lives up to the original, but in this case it exceeds. Obviously replaybility isn't quite a thing (unless you wait long enough), but it's a puzzle game. That's true for the genre. Worth every penny and minute.
the  sense of humor is phenomenal and the animations are some of the coolest thing I have seen in a video game of it's time and it still looks cool
